title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Federal Register Announcements
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Federal Register Announcements              Federal Register Announcements       14-Dec-15 ACTION: Notice Of Execution Of Agreement And Establishment Of Park. SUMMARY: The National Park Service announces that the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Energy have entered into an agreement governing the administration of facilities, land, or interests in land under the jurisdiction of the Department of Energy that are to be initially included in the Manhattan Project National Historical Park and setting out the specific responsibilities of each of the Secretaries with regard to the Park. This agreement satisfies the legal requirements to establish the Park. This new unit of the National Park System is located in Oak Ridge, Tennessee; Hanford, Washington; and Los Alamos, New Mexico.
